title: Disable hot corner function
body:
Since the last patch i cant play with full screen..
everytime when i click the top right corner the hot corner function will be triggered
does anyone know how to disable it?

replies.body:
To disable Hot Corners (Aero Snap in Windows) you can follow the guides below:

> * For macOS, follow [**these steps**](http://osxdaily.com/2016/08/10/disable-hot-corners-mac/).
* For Windows 10, follow [**these steps**](https://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4343-aero-snap-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

I hope this helped! Please let me know if it fixed the issue for you.

This does not help. Before the patch I could have hot corners on, (I'm playing on a mac) play league in full screen, get 80-100 fps, and not trigger hot corners by putting the cursor in the corners in game. Now I can't have hot corners on and get 50-60 fps.

I really don't like having to turn off hot corners when I start playing LoL then turn them back on again. So yes, there's a workaround, but I really hope it gets fixed.

Have the same problem. I am not sure the issue starts from the day of latest patch or the latest MacOS, but can someone find a way to solve it? Quite annoying, and hot corner should need to totally disabled, there should be some kind of bug involved{{champion:86}}
